utterances.text: Have you been to Shanghai lately?
Yeah, I've been there. The Shanghai metro is really convenient; it feels like you can get anywhere.
But you don't think those people are tired of walking so fast?
If you're slow, don't complain.
I think they're moving fast for a reason. They have to drive.
Yeah, it feels like everyone in Shanghai is in a hurry, even the subway is on time.
But I'm not used to that fast-tracking. Sometimes I miss my car.
Ha-ha, me too. It was a little panic at first, and then it got used to it.
However, there are a lot of subways in Shanghai, and sometimes the air is not good inside.
Yeah, especially at the peak, that's worse.
However, the subway cars in Shanghai are clean and generally comfortable.
Well, the Shanghai City Government is to be commended for its many subway optimizations.
In fact, every city has its benefits, and it's a little uncomfortable, but it's acceptable.
Well, I feel like I can find a place for myself anywhere.
Didn't you go to Beijing last time? It doesn't feel like Shanghai.
Yeah, well, the subway in Beijing is sometimes very old and looks a little broken.
But there's some old station, it's smelly, it feels like a trace of history.
That's true. Some stations in Beijing are really special.
It's like that. It's too much to go around in exchange.
Ha-ha. I thought I'd walk that way. I walked a lot.
You're funny, you're a sport, you can experience the subway.
However, the subways in Beijing are indeed easy, especially those passing through cities.
But I don't like being too crowded.
That is, the subway in Beijing is like a giant ants nest.
But at least it's a lot of times. It's always on.
Well, the subway in Beijing is old, but it's still working.
I think the subway cars in Beijing are quite spacious and comfortable.
Indeed, there are plenty of seats in the cars, not too crowded.
Have you ever been on the subway in Nanjing? How do you feel?
Yeah, Nanjing subways have recently built several new lines, and the whole feeling is modern.
Isn't Nanking subway on time?
Yes, Nanking's subway time is pretty good, everybody's punctual.
But sometimes I find something smells in Nanking's car.
Yeah, especially when it's hot, the air's not really flowing.
Don't you think there's a lot of subways in Nanking? It's uncomfortable.
You must be too crowded. Everyone's rushing home.
I'm not used to it, either. Maybe it's from Chengdu.
However, the subway station in Nanjing was clearly marked and was not lost.
It is true that, although a little crowded, once in the station, the direction is known.
Well, Nanking subways aren't always very large, but they're comfortable.
Overall, it's convenient, and traffic is fluid.
Have you been to Guangzhou lately? What?
I've been to Guangzhou. It's convenient.
That must be convenient. Where is the subway in Guangzhou?
Almost every region is covered, even in the suburbs.
Isn't that a lot of people in that car? It's too crowded to breathe.
Yeah, especially during peaks, it's pretty crowded.
The subway system in Guangzhou, however, can be time-appropriate and human.
Well, sometimes there's a lot more times at peak times.
Well, at least it doesn't feel like it's hanging out.
But the subway station in Guangzhou seems a little complicated, and it's a little confused when you switch.
Yeah, we've walked several ways to get to the next station.
That's true, if only it were simpler.
In general, however, it is convenient to get used to it.
Have you been to Chongqing recently? Is the subway different from the rest of the world?
Yes, Chongqing's subway is special, underground and uphill.
What do you think?
When I first sat on it, I was a little scared to look outside, but it was fun.
Ha-ha, that must have been a little hard on the air.
Well, really, stand up and see. It's a nice view.
Is Chongqing subway a little slower than other cities?
No, it's not. Although it's a bit twisted, it's still running on time.
Well, Chongqing's got a lot of food, and the subway can eat a lot.
Well, I'll have to go sit down and have a snack sometime.
Yes, Chongqing's food and subway can bring double enjoyment.
Well, there's got to be another chance, after all, it tastes unique.
Yeah, once. Always wanted to go again.
Haven't you been to Hangzhou lately?
Yeah, the Hangzhou subway's easy to get anywhere.
What do you think of Hangzhou's subway car?
It's not really big, but it's clean and it's nice.
Isn't the Hangzhou subway fast?
Yeah, especially the line to the airport. It's so convenient.
But Hangzhou's subway traffic is huge, right?
Yes, especially on holidays. The subway station is crowded.
The Hangzhou subway, however, will not be too difficult to walk, and the station will be clearly marked and easily located.
Well, it's a little crowded, but it's generally quite efficient.
I'd like to have a seat in Hangzhou and a visit to Lake West.
West Lake, that's Hangzhou's soul. Take the subway and see it at any stop.
So I can enjoy two beautiful, two birds with one stone.
Have you seen relatives lately? How do you deal with their marriages?
When will you find someone?
Every time I do this, I'm sick of it. I'm just gonna say something.
Find someone in a hurry, and when I'm old, no one will think about it.
Ha ha, you're forcing yourself into despair. But the elders are stubborn.
Well, they always think marriage means everything, and I really don't get it.
I think it would have worked better if it had been easy.
I tried to say, It hasn't happened yet. But they always said, It will never wait for you.
At the end of the day, that perception is not necessarily bad, and they care about us in the wrong way.
But it's always like being forced into marriage, and it's stressful.
You can actually think about changing the subject, talking about work or life.
Well, next time, at least a little bit less awkward.
So is my family. It's driving me crazy.
I don't get it. Why is everyone so serious about getting married?
Indeed, it is understandable that, after all, their generation is married early, so it may be felt that marriage is the ultimate goal of life.
Yeah, but not in modern times, and personal development should not be neglected.
I'm now pursuing my career. Love slowly.
Yes, they should have listened to that.
But they always felt that when they got married, everything would settle down.
Well, I don't know why they always think marriage solves everything.
It's like, Marriage = security of life. Who said that?
Why don't you learn?
That's funny.
They can only laugh. They won't understand what we think anyway.
And the other day, my dad started saying, It's not hard to find someone, it's hard to find something right, and I almost turned my eyes.
And he's so incomprehensible. Did you tell him that you know that suitability is all that matters?
I told him, but he always felt that the longer it took, the less chance he had.
Well, that's what the elders think. Don't worry, just tell them.
But every time I say that, it's really annoying, and every time I'm forced to marry, I'm going to crash.
Can your marriage represent my future?
Ha-ha, that scares them!
I'm more focused on myself now.
Yeah, it's both responsive and not too straightforward.
But I always think that these words also reflect their over-idealization of marriage.
Well, it's also a problem, and it's hard to convince the elders that getting married is like being happy.
Yesterday my mother sent me a message saying, You must get married soon.
Well, my mom always does, and I'm starting to wonder if I'm getting old.
Indeed, age was a problem, but marriage should not be the only criterion.
Yeah, I think life has many goals. Marriage is just one of them.
I don't want to. The right person hasn't met.
Ha ha, you say that, and they say, When do the right people meet?
Yeah, and then they're gonna start introducing me to a date, totally non-negotiable.
Well, I have to say, it's hard to understand the elders' idea of marriage, and it's really good to be married.
No, after all, they just want us to be safe.
Yes, but our generation also has our pace, which cannot be measured by their standards.
Even if they don't understand, we have to stick to our choices.
Well, take it easy. You know what you want.
